alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 15 at 1:00AM CST until February 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern New Mexico and far west Texas. * WHEN...Wind Advisory, until midnight MST tonight. High Wind Warning, from midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be the strongest just ahead of, and with the passage of, the cold front over your area.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands; Western El Paso County
